analysis.description:
KTOCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol#339-353) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol#350-351)

KTOCrowdsale.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_recipient' of Destructible.destroyAndSend (/unique_chucks/21/0xed440a72e5213b85ef960b5fb2b3f0312cf8d0dc.sol#102-103) is not in mixedCase
